verses.verse: Then he showed <S%H7200><s%> me Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and Satan <S%H7854><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> at his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> to accuse <S%H7853><s%> him.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Satan, <S%H7854><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> you, Satan! <S%H7854><s%> Indeed, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who has chosen <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> you! Is this <S%H2088><s%> not a brand <S%H181><s%> plucked <S%H5337><s%> from the fire <S%H784><s%>?"
Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was clothed <S%H3847><s%> with filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> and standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel. <S%H4397><s%>

And he spoke <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to those who were standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him saying, <S%H559><s%> "Remove <S%H5493><s%> the filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> from him." Again he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "See, <S%H7200><s%> I have taken <S%H5674><s%> your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> away <S%H5674><s%> from you and will clothe <S%H3847><s%> you with festal <S%H4254><s%> robes. <S%H4254><s%>"

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Let them put <S%H7760><s%> a clean <S%H2889><s%> turban <S%H6797><s%> on his head. <S%H7218><s%>" So they put <S%H7760><s%> a clean <S%H2889><s%> turban <S%H6797><s%> on his head <S%H7218><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him with garments, <S%H899><s%> while the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was standing <S%H5975><s%> by.
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> admonished <S%H5749><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> 'If <S%H518><s%> you will walk <S%H1980><s%> in My ways, <S%H1870><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you will perform <S%H8104><s%> My service, <S%H4931><s%> then you will also <S%H1571><s%> govern <S%H1777><s%> My house <S%H1004><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> have <S%H8104><s%> charge <S%H8104><s%> of My courts, <S%H2691><s%> and I will grant <S%H5414><s%> you free <S%H4109><s%> access <S%H1980><s%> among <S%H996><s%> these <S%H428><s%> who are standing <S%H5975><s%> [here.]

'Now <S%H4994><s%> listen, <S%H8085><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> you and your friends <S%H7453><s%> who are sitting <S%H3427><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of you â€“ indeed <S%H3588><s%> they are men <S%H376><s%> who are a symbol, <S%H4159><s%> for behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to bring <S%H935><s%> in My servant <S%H5650><s%> the Branch. <S%H6780><s%>

'For behold, <S%H2009><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> that I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Joshua; <S%H3091><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> eyes. <S%H5869><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will engrave <S%H9466><s%> an inscription <S%H6603><s%> on it,' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> 'and I will remove <S%H4185><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of that land <S%H776><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

'In that day, <S%H3117><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> 'every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of you will invite <S%H7121><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> to [sit] under <S%H8478><s%> [his] vine <S%H1612><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> [his] fig <S%H8384><s%> tree. <S%H8384><s%>' "
